table_description: The runner is the application that runs a job from a GitHub Actions workflow

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: Full name of the repository that contains the runners.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the runner.

columns.name: os
columns.description: The operating system of the runner.

columns.name: busy
columns.description: Indicates whether the runner is currently in use or not.

columns.name: labels
columns.description: Labels represents a collection of labels attached to each runner.
